rules: Rule1: If the facility requires legislation, then the facility has compliant production of drug1.
Rule2: Provided that the facility requires legislation, the facility has exempt production for drug1.
Rule3: Either the facility requires legislation or the facility generates profit.
Rule4: Under the condition that drug1 is an experimental drug at the facility, the facility generates profit.
Rule5: If the facility produces drug1, then either drug1 is an approved drug at the facility or drug1 is an experimental drug at the facility.
Rule6: Whenever the facility has authorization for production happens, the facility has renewed authorization for production.
Rule7: If the facility has renewed authorization for production, then the facility has valid authorization for production.
Rule8: Provided that the facility has valid authorization for production, the facility produces drug1.
Rule9: Either the facility violates legislation or the facility is compliant with legislation.
Rule10: Either drug1 has clinical trial success or drug1 has fast track approval.

Rule11: If drug1 has fast track approval, then, if it is not the case that whenever the facility requires legislation happens, it is not the case that the facility has exempt production for drug1 implies the facility has a special permit for drug1, then the facility has emergency approval for drug1.
Rule12: Whenever drug1 meets standards happens, drug1 is market ready.
Rule13: Under the condition that drug1 has phase3 complete, if drug1 has clinical trial success, then drug1 meets standards.
Rule14: Either drug1 has traditional development or drug1 has accelerated development.
Rule15: Whenever drug1 has accelerated development happens, drug1 is an experimental drug at the facility.
Rule16: Under the condition that drug1 has standard approval, drug1 is an approved drug at the facility.
Rule17: Provided that the facility is compliant with legislation, it is not the case that the facility requires legislation.
Rule18: If drug1 has funding secured, then, if drug1 has traditional development, then drug1 has standard approval.
Rule19: Whenever drug1 has investor backing happens, if drug1 has traditional development, then drug1 has standard approval.
Rule20: Provided that drug1 has a development plan, drug1 is implementation ready.
Rule21: If drug1 is implementation ready, then either drug1 has funding secured or drug1 has investor backing.
Rule22: Whenever the facility is fined under legislation happens, it is not the case that the facility requires legislation.
Rule23: Under the condition that the regulator suspends the facility, the facility operates.
Rule24: Provided that the facility is exempt from regulation, it is not the case that the facility operates.
Rule25: If drug1 is an approved drug at the facility, then the facility generates profit.

Rule26: Provided that it is not the case that either the facility is inspected by the regulator or it is not the case that the facility has compliant production of drug1, the facility is warned by the regulator.

Rule27: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the facility appeals legislation or, if the facility violates legislation, then the facility is fined under legislation, the regulator suspends the facility.
Rule28: Whenever it is not the case that drug1 has phase3 complete happens, drug1 requires additional testing.
Rule29: Provided that it is not the case that drug1 has phase3 complete, it is not the case that drug1 requires additional testing.
facts: Fact1: The facility has authorization for production.
Fact2: Drug1 has a development plan.
Fact3: The facility is exempt from regulation.
Fact4: It is not the case that the facility is inspected by the regulator.
Fact5: It is not the case that the facility is warned by the regulator.
Fact6: It is not the case that the facility has a special permit for drug1.
Fact7: It is not the case that the facility has emergency approval for drug1.
Fact8: It is not the case that drug1 is market ready.
Fact9: It is not the case that the facility appeals legislation.
